div.span: Virtual Instruction
Virtual learning for all students will continue daily through May 29, the last day of the 2019-20 school year.

img.alt: Student working on a iPad - Virtual Instruction banner

div.span: NHSD closed during COVID-19 pandemic
NHSD is closed and all activities and events are cancelled from the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.

img.alt: NHSD CLOSED amid coronavirus concerns graphic

div.span: Coronavirus (COVID-19)
We're continously monitoring the 2019 novel coronavirus (COVID-19). Here's where you can find updated information and resources for your family.

img.alt: Child washing hands amid coronavirus concerns

div.span: 2020-21 Kindergarten Registration
Kindergarten registration for the 2020-21 school year is now open. Registration begins online. Click below to begin the process.

img.alt: student holding a Welcome to Kindergarten sign!

div.span: Joe Welch named Pennsylvania 2020 Teacher of the Year
Congratulations to eighth grade social studies teacher Joe Welch who is Pennsylvania's Teacher of the Year for 2020.

img.alt: North Hills Middle School teacher Joe Welch

a.title: Independent Learning days are still virtual school days but are designed to allow students time to catch up and submit assignments, complete project-based learning activities, contact teachers for additional assistance or attend Zoom office hours. There is no new instruction. Complete details available at www.nhsd.net/VirtualInstruction.aspx.
